title: They found their place
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Eric Thompson
brief_description: This film deals with the problems of rehabilitation facing disabled ex-servicemen of World War 2, particularly those who have lost a limb. Something of the vocational guidance and the re-training facilities provided for these men is shown in this film.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian National Film Board and Eric Thompson
